title: Karnataka kids march into quarterfinals
text:
Karnataka kids march into quarterfinals Karnataka kids march into quarterfinals October 17,2015, Bengaluru, DHNS 
Karnataka entered the quarterfinals of the 24th Mini-Nationals (U-14) Volleyball tournament in both the boys’ and girls’ sections here on Friday. In the girls’ section, Karnataka continued their unbeaten run, with a 25-4, 25-5, 25-7 drubbing of Bihar after posting an easy win over Delhi (25-17, 25-16, 25-21) to book their last-eight berth. Karnataka boys secured their place on the back of two victories over Jammu & Kashmir (18-25, 25-18, 25-18, 25-20) and Delhi (25-17, 25-16, 25-21). Results: boys: League round: Group A: West Bengal bt Maharashtra 25-14, 25-22, 25-21; Tamil Nadu bt Gujarat 25-7, 25-11, 25-2. Group B: Karnataka bt Jammu & Kashmir 18-25, 25-18, 25-18, 25-20; Uttarakhand bt Telangana 25-18, 25-16, 25-11. Group C: Bihar bt Madhya Pradesh 25-22, 25-15, 25-21; Manipur bt Odisha 22-25, 25-20, 25-22, 25-13; Rajasthan bt Kerala 22-25, 25-19, 25-13, 25-18. Group D: Delhi bt Puducherry 22-25, 25-9, 25-13, 25-10; Uttar Pradesh bt Himachal Pradesh 25-11, 25-12, 25-5; Andhra Pradesh bt Chhattisgarh 25-13, 25-16, 25-9. Girls: Group B: Gujarat bt Uttarakhand 25-14, 25-19, 25-21; West Bengal bt Rajasthan 25-21, 25-12, 25-19 Group C: Karnataka bt Delhi 25-17, 25-16, 25-21; Haryana bt Uttar Pradesh 25-15, 25-22, 25-8. Group D: Maharashtra bt Pondicherry 26-24, 25-13, 25-20; Chhattisgarh bt Madhya Pradesh 22-25, 22-25, 25-23, 25-16, 15-11; Odisha bt Andhra Pradesh 26-24, 18-25, 25-23, 25-12; Kerala bt Jharkhand 25-7, 25-13, 25-13.Quarterfinal lineup: boys: Tamil Nadu vs Rajasthan; Karnataka vs Uttar Pradesh; Manipur vs Andhra Pradesh; West Bengal vs Uttarakhand. Girls: Tamil Nadu vs Rajasthan; Haryana vs Maharashtra; Karnataka vs Telangana; Kerala vs West Bengal.
